items.title: WATCH:  Lava flows on Mount Etna on New Year's Day
items.description: A drone captured stunning footage of lava flowing from a fissure on Italy's Mount Etna on New Year's Day.

items.title: Anthony Joshua's driver charged after deadly crash in Nigeria
items.description: Police say the driver in a deadly car crash that injured heavyweight champion Anthony Joshua and killed his two friends in Nigeria has been charged

items.title: FBI says it thwarted potential New Year's terror attack 'directly inspired' by ISIS
items.description: The FBI in Charlotte, North Carolina, said it "thwarted a potential" New Year's Eve terror attack.

items.title: WATCH:  Ohio police search for suspect after dentist, wife found murdered at home
items.description: Ohio authorities are searching for a suspect after a dentist and his wife were found murdered inside their home earlier this week.

items.title: Sparklers in champagne bottles may have led to deadly Swiss fire: Investigators
items.description: Investigators probing the deadly New Year's Day fire at a Swiss resort bar are looking into the possibility that it started from sparklers.
